metadata.title: CVE-2013-4116 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/npm.js in Node Packaged Modules (npm) before 1.3.3 allows local usersto overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary files withpredictable names that are created when unpacking archives.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

npm - 3.5.2-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: npm package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.2-0ubuntu4').
